articles.title: DPRK fully ready for dialogue and war
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean liberation celebrated 
    Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the embassy on August 20 on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of Korean liberation.
 Present on invitation were Ri Kum Bom, minister of post and telecommunications, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of foreign affairs, and other officials concerned. 
 Speeches were made at the reception.
